text: Our Marketing team is wanting to move all Blog posts from one portal to another, we have a script that can handle that portion, however, then they want redirects to automatically be created for those “now-moved” blog posts from the original portal which is a different domain. What API would I use for creating new Redirects in a portal, would it be: <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/methods/url-mappings/post_url_mappings>?
